title: Rupee depreciation set to benefit country’s $283 billion IT sector
description: The recent plunge of the rupee has sparked optimism in India's IT sector, with major companies poised to gain from favorable currency movements. Analysts predict that a weaker rupee will enhance operating margins, providing a cushion amid challenging economic…
content: The rupees fall to a historic low against the US dollar on Wednesday has left one segment of companies cheering Indias $283 billion information technology (IT) sector.The rupee plunged to 90.29 again… [+4055 chars]
